title: Lal Isua zui chuan phaizawlah pawh ka kal ang
lyrics:
Lal Isua zui chuan phaizawlah pawh ka kal ang,
Khawiah pawh tuihna awmna leh ni ennaah;
Khaw tina min hruai pawhin ka zui zel fo vang a,
A hniakhnung zuia lallukhum chan thlengin.

Zui rawh, zui rawh, kei pawh ka zui ve ang (2)
Khawiah pawh ram tinah ka zui zel ang a.

Tidamtu zui chuan luidungah pawh ka kal ang,
Khawiah pawh thlipui tleh leh ruahpui sur sela,
Aman min hruai leh min ven chuan ka hlau tawp lo vang,
Lalpa kiangah awm ila, ka muang fo vang.

Luikawrah leh kawng hrehawmah kal mah ila,
Tidamtuin ka thlarau a vawng fo vang a;
Ama kalnaah him takin min hruai zel ang a,
Vanramah an inkhawmnaah min hruai ang.
